FuncDef: The display atm-bundle command displays information about an ATM bundle interface and its member interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of an ATM bundle interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 1023.

Examples: Operate status: up     Number Of Up Port In Bundle: 1
ExtraInfo:
ATM bundle is an extended ATM PWE3 application to transparently transmit ATM cells. An ATM bundle interface allows services of the same type on multiple NodeBs to be transmitted along the same PW to the RNC.
After an ATM bundle interface is configured, run the display atm-bundle command to view the ATM bundle interface status, and the total number and status of ATM bundle member interfaces.
